description: Unique surrogate identifier for a tire record in the catalog; used as the primary key and to link tires to vehicles, inventory, and maintenance records.
Human-readable tire size designation in industry format (e.g., width/aspect ratio/construction/rim diameter), representing the specification used for fitment, procurement, and inventory.
Boolean flag marking the tire specification as retired or inactive; when set, exclude from new assignments and ordering, but retain for historical reference.
